title: Add fictional-copyright disclaimer to Home page bottom

requirements.summary: Add the exact fictional-copyright disclaimer as the final block of content on the Home page, styled at 14px and readable in light/dark themes.
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting the Home page shows the disclaimer as the last content on the page (below the existing Call to Action section).
The disclaimer text matches the user-provided wording exactly, including capitalization and punctuation.
The disclaimer is styled at 14px font size (e.g., Tailwind text-sm or an explicit 14px class) and remains readable in both light and dark themes.

file_operations.description: Append a new disclaimer block after the existing Call to Action section so it renders as the last content on the page. Use the exact text: "This is a 100 percent fictional organization that isnt in fallout or any games of fallout. all fallout works are copyrighted and owned by Bethesda Game Studios." Style it at 14px (e.g., Tailwind text-[14px]) and use theme-aware text classes (e.g., muted/foreground tokens) to ensure readability in both light and dark modes. Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui and do not change SiteLayout navigation/footer behavior; keep the disclaimer within HomePage content only.
